data.message: Hey Facebook, when I clicked a 1000 times on 'Do not want to see' (ic 'People you may know') and you only show it more and more and more and more and more - what do you want me to think?

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Tracey. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Hannah

Facebook Gentlemen Facebook Inc. I ask you to re-deploy Faisaly of Jordan Page, a Sports Page does not do harm to anyone, and we will abide by the terms and policies of Facebook and will not publish anything there by mistake Please start again as soon as the order to offer followers club Al Faisaly News .. /faisaly.alz3eem/
